snippet: The share of law graduates employed a year out of school fell again last year, to its lowest level since 1994, according to NALP, the Association for Legal Career Professionals.
abstract: The share of law graduates employed a year out of school fell again last year, to its lowest level since 1994, according to NALP, the Association for Legal Career Professionals.

headline.main: Employment of Recent Law Grads at an Ebb
